title: With the feature enabled,  Verify that user can replace the existing file name or extension entry using Replace option using CSV file
custom_steps:
1.Enable to Feature
2.Login to Tenant UI
3.Click on RealTime Protection under policies
4.Select  any category and select activity as Browse,Upload and Download
5.Click on Add Criteria & Constraints section
6.Select File constraints
7.Click on Replace list and import the CSV file
8.Create the policy
custom_expected: Exisiting entry should get wipe-off and  new entries should get added to the file name or file extensions
